title: Typography instructor wanted in San Francisco USA
content:
I saw this on a Craigslist.org posting. Perfect for a local typophile:   
   
 [http://www.craigslist.org/sfc/med/24357175.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000504/http:/www.craigslist.org/sfc/med/24357175.html)   
   
"The ideal candidate for this class will have a strong knowledge of the history of typography, be confident with hand-lettering and well versed in the uses of type today. Teaching experience is not as important as having a passion for the subject."
author: joevdb
